aboutMe.headline: About me
aboutMe.description1: I am a junior Frontend developer from Dortmund, passionate about technology and always eager to learn new skills. I am currently looking for a full-time position to grow in a creative environment and take on new challenges.
aboutMe.description2: If you are looking for a dedicated developer with a strong willingness to learn, I would be happy to hear from you!
aboutMe.officeStatus: Open to in-office, hybrid, and remote work.

mySkills.headline: My skills
mySkills.description1: Don’t see the skill you need?

portfolio.description: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.

portfolioProject.description: Program that retrieves data about Pokémon from an API and presents it as a card deck. Includes a search function for easy navigation and finding Pokémon.
Jump-and-Run game: A game developed using object-oriented programming. Defeat enemies on the way to the final boss and collect items along the way.
Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
